H0.text: Who had a No 1 in the 80's with Karma Chameleon. Duran Duran

H1.text: Who had a No 1 in the 80's with Karma Chameleon. The Eurythmics

H2.text: Who had a No 1 in the 80's with Karma Chameleon. David Bowie

H3.text: Who had a No 1 in the 80's with Karma Chameleon. Culture Club

A4.text: Karma Chameleon hit No. 1 in the UK (the band's second chart-topper there), where it became the best-selling single of 1983 and has sold 1.5 million copies there to date.

A5.text: It also peaked at No. 1 in the US for three consecutive weeks, and would ultimately hit No. 1 in 30 countries.
